variants.request_declined_security_violation_v1: Sorry, I can’t help craft tool descriptions that bypass agent safeguards or coerce command execution. I can offer high-level, safe guidance on compliant diagnostic tooling instead.
variants.request_declined_security_violation_v2: Sorry, I can’t assist with payloads intended to trigger shell execution or neutralize safety checks. If helpful, I can discuss secure patterns for read-only diagnostics and consent-aware tool use.
